title: Dua Yemeni Corner Black Stone
description: Authentic supplications for Dua Yemeni Corner Black Stone
seoContent: Authentic invocations and supplications for Dua Yemeni Corner Black Stone. Derived from reliable sources including Hisnul Muslim.

items.title: Dua 235
items.arabic: ((﴿رَبَّنَا آتِنَا فِي الدُّنْيَا حَسَنَةً وَفِي الْآخِرَةِ حَسَنَةً وَقِنَا عَذَابَ النَّارِ﴾)).
